post.body: This is fucking brilliant and I had no idea it existed. ♫ http://blip.fm/~1fqyb
Thanks for Copyright info. And I've got In Rainbows. I was actually looking for Disc 2. I found it so I can send that to you
You should probably lower them even more so.
Thanks! Very nice of you to stop in and listen. Please keep me updated on your works, too.
me too. me too!
Um. That all depends on whether I really like you or not. ;-)
DJ Shadow? O RLY? You can still do this kind of track? I'm in. ♫ http://blip.fm/~1frcf
lol! @donkeyrapist great name. This'n is timeless. ♫ http://blip.fm/~1fr2h
"I am a rock bottom riser - and I owe it all to you." ♫ http://blip.fm/~1fq96
Wow. Radiohead took down the free download of "In Rainbows." Nine Inch Nails continue to reign as kings of non-douchebaggery.
In MGS4, the stun grenades cause Snake to temporarily experience tinnitus. Is it strange that it happens to me, too? Like every time?
I want to share this new piece I've been working on so bad, but it's not copyrighted. Does it count if you email your work to yourself?
you wanna know what's sad? Watchin TV, I stopped on what I thought was The Clone Wars cartoon (CG), but it was actually the Phantom Menace
I heard you have a compilation of every good song ever done by anybody...but I was there! ♫ http://blip.fm/~1e884
"It's all been candy cream - neatly smooth and clean forever." ♫ http://blip.fm/~1e7xh
starting off the year right - bitterly spitting hypercritical, virulent remarks at persons.
Exhausted after creating a "year-end best of music of 2008" list only to spite my friend, Paul.
your pets will LOOOOOK at BOWL. And now BOWL's perfect for throwing away.
"Oh no! My father's amateur pornos! I love you dad...and those money shots." - Carl from ATHF
Best of moriddim now streaming on MySpace including remixes of Cat Power, A Flock of Seagulls, Underworld & more http://ping.fm/RY4L2
